starts.name: A Scion of House Ossum
starts.desc:
You were born in luxury and nobility, amongst a very close knit family of Eventide.

Even since you were a child, you felt a calling, to be an adventurer! So as soon as you could, you explored the Cosmos with the help and support of your family.

After your last adventure, you have managed to find the ancestral ship of your family, the unique Retribution-Class Battleship...

Maybe it's time to go back home?
